channel.title: Client crash when thieving is leveled
channel.description:
whenever someone gets a thieving level up, there client crashes, any ideas what may cause this? 317 deltascape
i know its not when they just thieve, because it doesnt happen when you are 99 thieving and click on a stall, only when you level up

item.title: Client crash when thieving is leveled
item.dc:creator: @claunchii claunchii
item.description:
@claunchii wrote:

Your code for theiving is problly really messy and cant support when you level. Or your server is shit. Check one of the theiving guides.

Read full topic
